searchIndex.title: Introduction to Neo Service Layer
searchIndex.content: Neo Service Layer is an enterprise-grade blockchain infrastructure platform with 22+ smart contracts and Intel SGX support

searchIndex.title: Quick Start Guide
searchIndex.content: Get started with Neo Service Layer in under 5 minutes. Install SDK, connect to network, make first service call

searchIndex.title: JavaScript SDK Installation
searchIndex.content: Install the Neo Service Layer JavaScript SDK using npm, yarn, or pnpm. Supports Node.js 14+ and modern browsers

searchIndex.title: SDK Configuration
searchIndex.content: Configure the SDK with network settings, authentication, blockchain type selection, and advanced options

searchIndex.title: Storage Service
searchIndex.content: Store and retrieve data with encryption, access control, and versioning. Supports JSON, binary, and structured data

searchIndex.title: Oracle Service
searchIndex.content: Access external data feeds, create custom oracles, and subscribe to real-time data updates

searchIndex.title: Compute Service
searchIndex.content: Execute distributed computations with Intel SGX protection, zero-knowledge proofs, and verifiable results

searchIndex.title: Identity Service
searchIndex.content: Manage digital identities, credentials, and attestations with privacy-preserving technology

searchIndex.title: Lending Service
searchIndex.content: Create lending pools, manage collateral, calculate interest rates, and handle liquidations

searchIndex.title: Marketplace Service
searchIndex.content: Build NFT marketplaces, asset exchanges, and trading platforms with auction support

searchIndex.title: Tokenization Service
searchIndex.content: Tokenize real-world assets, create custom tokens, and manage token lifecycle

searchIndex.title: API Authentication
searchIndex.content: Authenticate API requests using JWT tokens, API keys, OAuth 2.0, and role-based access control

searchIndex.title: POST /storage/store
searchIndex.content: Store data with optional encryption, access control, versioning, and metadata

searchIndex.title: GET /storage/{key}
searchIndex.content: Retrieve stored data by key with automatic decryption and access validation

searchIndex.title: POST /oracle/request
searchIndex.content: Request external data from oracle networks with custom parameters and callbacks

searchIndex.title: WebSocket Events
searchIndex.content: Subscribe to real-time blockchain events, transaction updates, and service notifications

searchIndex.title: Rate Limiting
searchIndex.content: API requests are rate limited per API key with tiered limits and burst capacity

searchIndex.title: Error Codes Reference
searchIndex.content: Complete list of API error codes, descriptions, and troubleshooting guidelines

searchIndex.title: Docker Quick Start
searchIndex.content: Get Neo Service Layer running locally with Docker Compose in minutes

searchIndex.title: Kubernetes Deployment
searchIndex.content: Deploy to Kubernetes for production workloads with high availability, auto-scaling, and monitoring

searchIndex.title: Intel SGX Setup
searchIndex.content: Configure Intel SGX for hardware-based security, enclave management, and trusted execution

searchIndex.title: Environment Configuration
searchIndex.content: Configure environment variables, secrets management, and service configuration

searchIndex.title: Load Balancing
searchIndex.content: Configure load balancers, health checks, and traffic distribution for high availability

searchIndex.title: Monitoring & Observability
searchIndex.content: Set up Prometheus, Grafana, logging, and alerting for production monitoring

searchIndex.title: Security Best Practices
searchIndex.content: Implement security hardening, network policies, and vulnerability management

searchIndex.title: Backup & Recovery
searchIndex.content: Configure automated backups, disaster recovery, and data restoration procedures

searchIndex.title: TypeScript Support
searchIndex.content: Full TypeScript definitions, interfaces, and type safety for all SDK methods

searchIndex.title: Error Handling
searchIndex.content: Comprehensive error handling, retry logic, and graceful degradation strategies

searchIndex.title: Batch Operations
searchIndex.content: Execute multiple operations in batches for improved performance and atomicity

searchIndex.title: WebSocket Integration
searchIndex.content: Real-time event streaming, subscription management, and connection handling
